item.title: CVE-2024-45440|2024-09-12T15:27:33.952572 -- drupal -- drupal%20core
item.description: core/authorize.php in Drupal 11.x-dev allows Full Path Disclosure (even when error logging is None) if the value of hash_salt is file_get_contents of a file that does not exist.
